GSD.description:
blk-mq: use quiesced elevator switch when reinitializing queues

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit c478b3b2900f1834cf9eda5bfef0d5696099505d. For more details please see the references link.
